member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxPlacementMode
member.summary: Defines the supported placement options for the drop-down that contains the available suggestion items.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxPlacementMode.Auto
member.summary: The position of the drop-down is dynamically calculated based on the available screen estate.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxPlacementMode.Top
member.summary: The drop-down is always displayed above the input field.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxPlacementMode.Bottom
member.summary: The drop-down is always displayed below the input field.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxPlacementMode.None
member.summary: The drop-down is not displayed. In this scenario the property can be bound to an external items control to display the available suggestion items.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxFilterMode
member.summary: Defines the possible text filter modes provided by .

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxFilterMode.StartsWith
member.summary: In this mode filters the items based on whether the starting sequence of each candidate matches the current user input.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.AutoCompleteBoxFilterMode.Contains
member.summary: In this mode filters the items based on whether the input sequence is contained in each candidate.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode used to filter the suggestion items based on the user input.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterComparisonMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value from the enumeration that defines the way the candidate suggestion key is compared to the current user input.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing a property path on a single object within the that is used to filter the suggestion items.
member.remarks: If no value is set, the value is used to filter the suggestion items as well.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.DisplayMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing a property path on a single object within the that is used to display the suggestion items.
member.remarks: If no value is set, the value is used to filter the suggestion items as well.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterStartThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of symbols which need to be typed in before the filtering procedure starts.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the struct that represents the time interval between the last end-user input action and a filter pass operation. The default value of this property is 0 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilterMemberProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets a function that acquires the property value of the suggestion item based on which the suggestion is filtered.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.FilteredItems
member.summary: Gets an implementation that contains all currently available suggestion items based on the provided input.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets an implementation of the interface that contains the items available for suggestion items in this instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that defines the visual structure of a suggestion item.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.AutosuggestFirstItem
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first suggestion item should be highlighted by default when the drop-down control is open.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.RadAutoCompleteBox.DropDownPlacement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the placement of the drop-down that holds the available suggestion items.

member.summary: All multiples of the current time step are shown in the looping selector.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior.BaseAndMultiples
member.summary: The base (starting) value and all multiples are shown in the looping selector.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior.StartFromBase
member.summary: Each value in the looping selector is generated by adding the step value to each previous value starting from the base value.

member.summary: Fired when the selector part of the control has been closed.

member.summary: Fires when the selector part of the control has been opened.

member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that defines the fill and border of the Selector part of the control. The Style should target the type.

member.summary: Gets or sets the length (width and height) of the items that appear in the popup (selector) part of the picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical spacing among of the items that appear in the popup (selector) part of the picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the selector format. This value defines how the different selector components will be ordered. By setting this property, you can also define which editable parts of the selector will be visible. For example setting 'y/m' will display the Year and Month components in a instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether the selector part of the control is opened.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the struct that represents the default value displayed in the picker popup. The default value is shown when the property is set to null.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets the header displayed in the popup of this instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorHeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that represents the template used to visualise the content defined by the property.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items visible within the popup (selector) part of the picker. This property is used to determine the height of the selector part when opened. The calculated height will not exceed the height of the current top-level Window. Pass non-positive value to stretch the selector vertically.
